nxt.nav.path

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.nav.path.Grid

  • public final class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the grid the robot navigates in, with each tile having an attribute such as being an obstacle or the number of tiles necessary to reach it from the starting tile.
    Author:
    Andrei Purcarus
